intro: Platanocarpum cordatum, commonly known as the heartleaf platanocarpum, is a member of the Malvaceae family. It is a small evergreen shrub characterized by its distinctive heart-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous small seeds. It is native to tropical regions of South America and is often found in moist, shaded environments.
